titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C33

body.ab: <lb n="c57-0172__main__27"/> August <mdel>27</mdel>31<shi rend="sup"></shi><lb n="c57-0172__main__28"/> My beloved <mdel>s</mdel>Sister<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0172__main__29"/> I write to you encompassed by peril <lb n="c57-0172__main__30"/> and ignorant if I am ever doomed to <lb n="c57-0172__main__31"/> see again <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0172__main__d3e34808"/>my<del eID="c57-0172__main__d3e34808"/> dear England & the dearer <lb n="c57-0172__main__32"/> friends that inhabit it. I am surrounded <lb n="c57-0172__main__33"/> by mountains of ice which admit of no <lb n="c57-0172__main__34"/> escape and threaten every moment to<lb n="c57-0173__main__1"/> crush my vessel. The brave fellows whom I persua<lb n="c57-0173__main__2"/>ded to be my companions look at me for aid <lb n="c57-0173__main__3"/> but I have none <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to bestow. There is somthing terribly appall<lb n="c57-0173__main__4"/>ing in our situation Yet my courage & hopes do <lb n="c57-0173__main__5"/> not desert me — We may survive & if we do not – <lb n="c57-0173__main__6"/> I will repeat the lessons of my Seneca & die with a <lb n="c57-0173__main__7"/> good heart.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0173__main__8"/> Yet what, Margaret, will be your state – You <lb n="c57-0173__main__9"/> will not hear of my destruction and you will <lb n="c57-0173__main__10"/> anxiously awai<mdel>d</mdel>t my return – Years will pass <lb n="c57-0173__main__11"/> and you will have visitings of despair &<lb n="c57-0173__main__12"/> yet be cheered by hope. Oh my beloved sister <lb n="c57-0173__main__13"/> the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34885"/>siskness<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34885"/> sicknening failings of your heart <lb n="c57-0173__main__14"/> felt expectations <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34890"/>have<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34890"/> are in prospect <lb n="c57-0173__main__15"/> more terrible to me than my own death –But <lb n="c57-0173__main__16"/> you have a husband and lovely children— <lb n="c57-0173__main__17"/> you may be happy — Heaven bless you &<lb n="c57-0173__main__18"/> make you so.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0173__main__19"/> My <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34907"/>in<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34907"/> unfortunate gu<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34910"/>i<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34910"/>est regards <lb n="c57-0173__main__20"/> me with the tenderest compassion – He <lb n="c57-0173__main__21"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34917"/>fills<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34917"/> endeavours to fill me with hope – And <lb n="c57-0173__main__22"/> talks as if life were a thing which he loved <lb n="c57-0173__main__23"/> He reminds me how often the same acci<lb n="c57-0173__main__24"/>dents have happened to other navigators, <lb n="c57-0173__main__25"/> who have attempted the same sea. In <lb n="c57-0173__main__26"/> spite of myself he fills me with cheerful <lb n="c57-0173__main__27"/> augu<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34938"/>i<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34938"/>ries. Even the sailors feel the benefit <lb n="c57-0173__main__28"/> of his eloquence – when he speaks they <lb n="c57-0173__main__29"/> no longer despair – he rouzes their ener<lb n="c57-0173__main__30"/>gies& they believe <del rend="smear" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34952"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34952"/> these vast mountains <lb n="c57-0173__main__31"/> of ice <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34971"/>and<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34971"/>are mole hills which will va<lb n="c57-0173__main__32"/>nish before the resolutions of man. <lb n="c57-0173__main__33"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0173__main__d3e34990"/>But<del eID="c57-0173__main__d3e34990"/> this is but transitory and each <lb n="c57-0173__main__34"/> days expectation delayed, fills them fear &<lb n="c57-0173__main__35"/> I almost dread the mutiny of despair<lb n="c57-0174__main__1"/> September 6<shi rend="sup"></shi><lb n="c57-0174__main__2"/> A scene has just passed of such <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0174__main__d3e35027"/>curious<del eID="c57-0174__main__d3e35027"/>uncommoninter<lb n="c57-0174__main__3"/>rest that although it is highly probable that <lb n="c57-0174__main__4"/> the papers may never reach you, my dear <lb n="c57-0174__main__5"/> Margeret, yet I cannot forbear recording it. <lb n="c57-0174__main__6"/> We are still surrounded by <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>mountains of ice still in <mdel>e</mdel>im <lb n="c57-0174__main__7"/>minent danger of being crushed in their conflict.— The cold is excessive &<lb n="c57-0174__main__8"/><lb n="c57-0174__left_margin__1"/>many of my unfortunate comrades have already <lb n="c57-0174__main__9"/> found a grave admidst this scene of <lb n="c57-0174__main__10"/> desolation. Frankenstein has declined daily <lb n="c57-0174__main__11"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0174__main__d3e35097"/>his<del eID="c57-0174__main__d3e35097"/> in health a feverish fire still glim<lb n="c57-0174__main__12"/>mers in his eyes but he is ex<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hausted &<lb n="c57-0174__main__13"/> when suddenly rouzed to any exertion he <lb n="c57-0174__main__14"/> speedily sinks again <mdel>to</mdel>into apparent lifelessness.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0174__main__15"/> I mentioned my last letter the fears <lb n="c57-0174__main__16"/> I had of mutiny. This morning as I sat <lb n="c57-0174__main__17"/> watching the wan countenance of my friend his <lb n="c57-0174__main__18"/> eyes half closed and his limbs hanging list<lb n="c57-0174__main__19"/>lessly I was rouzed by half a dozen of the <lb n="c57-0174__main__20"/> sailors who desired admission into the ca<lb n="c57-0174__main__21"/>bin they enter<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0174__main__d3e35162"/>r<del eID="c57-0174__main__d3e35162"/>ed & their leader adressed <lb n="c57-0174__main__22"/> me. He told me that he & his compani<lb n="c57-0174__main__23"/>ons had been chosen by the other sailors <lb n="c57-0174__main__24"/> to come in deputation to me to make <lb n="c57-0174__main__25"/> a demand which in justice I could not <lb n="c57-0174__main__26"/> refuse. We were immured by ice &<lb n="c57-0174__main__27"/> would probably never escape but they <lb n="c57-0174__main__28"/> feared that if, as was possible the ice <lb n="c57-0174__main__29"/> should be dissipated and a free passage <lb n="c57-0174__main__30"/> opened I should be rash enough to conti<lb n="c57-0174__main__31"/>nue my voyage & lead them to fresh <lb n="c57-0174__main__32"/> dangers after they <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0174__main__d3e35203"/>had<del eID="c57-0174__main__d3e35203"/>might<mdel>so</mdel> happily havesur<lb n="c57-0174__main__33"/>mounted<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0174__main__d3e35225"/>this<del eID="c57-0174__main__d3e35225"/><mdel>.</mdel>this. They desired therefore that <lb n="c57-0174__main__34"/> I should make a solemn promise that <lb n="c57-0174__main__35"/> when if the vessel should be freed, <metamark>^</metamark>that I<lb n="c57-0175__main__1"/> would instantly direct my course to En<lb n="c57-0175__main__2"/>gland.Archangel.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0175__main__3"/> This speech tro<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ubled <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35298"/>b<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35298"/> me. I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35306"/>did<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35306"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>had not despaired<lb n="c57-0175__main__4"/> nor had I yet conceived the idea of returning <lb n="c57-0175__main__5"/> if set free. Yet could I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in justice, or even in <lb n="c57-0175__main__6"/> possibility refuse th<del rend="overwritten" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35341"/>e<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35341"/>is<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35350"/>e<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35350"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35355"/>men<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35355"/>demand. I hesitated be<lb n="c57-0175__main__7"/>fore I answered when Frankenstein who had <lb n="c57-0175__main__8"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35374"/>hitherto<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35374"/> at first been silent & indeed <lb n="c57-0175__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0175__left_margin__1"/>appeared hardly to have force enough to attend <lb n="c57-0175__main__10"/> now rouzed himself. His eyes sparkled <lb n="c57-0175__main__11"/> an<mdel/>d his cheek flushed was with momentary <lb n="c57-0175__main__12"/> vigour. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35415"/>and<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35415"/> Turning to the men he <lb n="c57-0175__main__13"/> said; What do you mean? What do <lb n="c57-0175__main__14"/> you demand of your captain? Are <lb n="c57-0175__main__15"/> you then so easily turned from your <lb n="c57-0175__main__16"/> design? Did you <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35427"/>n<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35427"/>ot <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35430"/>expect<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35430"/> call this <lb n="c57-0175__main__17"/> a glorious expedition &<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35437"/>why<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35437"/>wherefore was it <mdel>so</mdel>glorious?<lb n="c57-0175__main__18"/> Not because the way was smooth <lb n="c57-0175__main__19"/>& placid as a <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35460"/>summer lake<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35460"/>southern sea but <lb n="c57-0175__main__20"/> because it was full of dangers &<lb n="c57-0175__main__21"/> terror – because at every new incident <lb n="c57-0175__main__22"/> your fortitude was to be called forth & your <lb n="c57-0175__main__23"/> courage exhibited– Because death & danger <lb n="c57-0175__main__24"/> surrounded you & these you were to <lb n="c57-0175__main__25"/> brave & overcome. For this was it a glori<lb n="c57-0175__main__26"/>ous; for this was it <mdel>&</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>an honorable under<lb n="c57-0175__main__27"/>taking. You were to <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>be hereafter hailed <lb n="c57-0175__main__28"/> as the benefactors of your species – Your names <lb n="c57-0175__main__29"/> adored as the brave men who encoun<lb n="c57-0175__main__30"/>tered death for honor &<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35540"/>glory<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35540"/>the benefit of mankind. – And now <lb n="c57-0175__main__31"/> behold with the first <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35551"/>straw<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35551"/>imagination of danger –or if <lb n="c57-0175__main__32"/> you will – The first mighty & terrific <lb n="c57-0175__main__33"/> trial <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0175__main__d3e35562"/>you shri<del eID="c57-0175__main__d3e35562"/> of your courage you <lb n="c57-0175__main__34"/> shrink away & are content to be handed<lb n="c57-0176__main__1"/> down as men who had not strength <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35580"/>danger<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35580"/>to endure<lb n="c57-0176__main__2"/> cold & peril – And so poor souls they were <lb n="c57-0176__main__3"/> chilly & returned to their warm fire sides–Why <lb n="c57-0176__main__4"/> that requires not this preperation –Ye need <lb n="c57-0176__main__5"/> not <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35599"/>co<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35599"/> have come thus far & dragged <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35602"/>to<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35602"/> your <lb n="c57-0176__main__6"/> Captain to the shame of a defeat to prove <lb n="c57-0176__main__7"/> yourselves cowards. Oh be men or be <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35610"/>for<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35610"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__8"/> more than men – be steady to your pur<lb n="c57-0176__main__9"/>poses& firm as rock. this ice is not made <lb n="c57-0176__main__10"/> of such stuff as your hearts might be. it is mutable & cannot <lb n="c57-0176__main__11"/> withand you if you say that it shall <lb n="c57-0176__main__12"/> not. Do not return to your families <lb n="c57-0176__main__13"/> with <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35640"/>s<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35640"/> the stigma of disgrace marked on <lb n="c57-0176__main__14"/> your brows– return as heroes who have <lb n="c57-0176__main__15"/> fought & conquered & who know not what <lb n="c57-0176__main__16"/> it is to turn their backs on the foe<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35649"/>s<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35649"/>.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__17"/> He spoke thus with a voice so mo<lb n="c57-0176__main__18"/>dulated to the different feelings expressed <lb n="c57-0176__main__19"/> in his speech – with an eye so full of <lb n="c57-0176__main__20"/> high design & heroism that can you <lb n="c57-0176__main__21"/> wonder that the<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35670"/>n<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35670"/> men were moved –They <lb n="c57-0176__main__22"/> looked at one <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35677"/>atho<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35677"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>another& were unable to reply. <lb n="c57-0176__main__23"/> I spoke. I told them to retire & consider <lb n="c57-0176__main__24"/> of what had been said. That I would <lb n="c57-0176__main__25"/> not lead them further north if they <lb n="c57-0176__main__26"/> streneously <mdel/>desired the contrary but that <lb n="c57-0176__main__27"/> I hoped that with reflection their courage <lb n="c57-0176__main__28"/> would return. They retired and I turned to <lb n="c57-0176__main__29"/> my friend but he was sunk<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35717"/>s<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35717"/> in languor <lb n="c57-0176__main__30"/> and almost deprived of life.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__31"/> How <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35726"/>it<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35726"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35729"/>will<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35729"/> all this <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will terminate I <lb n="c57-0176__main__32"/> know not. But I had rather die <mdel>&</mdel>than return <lb n="c57-0176__main__33"/> shamefully, my purpose unfulfilled–Yet <lb n="c57-0176__main__34"/> I fear <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35762"/>that<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35762"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35765"/>that<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35765"/>such will be my fate The <lb n="c57-0176__main__35"/> men <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0176__main__d3e35775"/>unf<del eID="c57-0176__main__d3e35775"/> unsupported by the ideas of glory<lb n="c57-0177__main__1"/> and honor can<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35789"/>d<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35789"/> never willingly continue to en<lb n="c57-0177__main__2"/>dure their present hardships.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__3"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0177.01" unit="tei:date"/>September 7<shi rend="underline"></shi><lb n="c57-0177__main__4"/> The die is cast. I have consented to return if we <lb n="c57-0177__main__5"/> are not destroyed. Thus are my hopes blasted– <lb n="c57-0177__main__6"/> by cowardice and indecision – I come back <lb n="c57-0177__main__7"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35824"/>bringing no new<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35824"/>ignorant& dissa<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ppointed –It requires a <lb n="c57-0177__main__8"/> great deal ofmore philosophy <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>than I possess to bear this injustice <lb n="c57-0177__main__9"/> with patience –<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__10"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0177.04" unit="tei:date"/>September 1<mdel>7</mdel>2<shi rend="underline"></shi><lb n="c57-0177__main__11"/> It is past. I am returning to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35901"/>England<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35901"/>Archangel. I have <lb n="c57-0177__main__12"/> lost my hopes of utility & glory –I have lost <lb n="c57-0177__main__13"/> my friend. But <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35912"/>if<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35912"/> I <mdel>am</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will<mdel>at</mdel> endeavour <lb n="c57-0177__main__14"/> to detail the bitter circumstances to you, <lb n="c57-0177__main__15"/> my dear sister – And while I am wafted <lb n="c57-0177__main__16"/> towards England & towards you I will not <lb n="c57-0177__main__17"/> despair. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35942"/>Sep<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35942"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__18"/> September 9<shi rend="underline"></shi> The ice began to move <lb n="c57-0177__main__19"/> and roarings like thunder was heard <lb n="c57-0177__main__20"/> at a distance as the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35962"/>mountains<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35962"/>islands split <lb n="c57-0177__main__21"/>& cracked in every direction. We were <lb n="c57-0177__main__22"/> in the most eminent peril – But as we <lb n="c57-0177__main__23"/> could only remain passive my chief at<lb n="c57-0177__main__24"/>tention was <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35982"/>co<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35982"/> occupied by my unfor<lb n="c57-0177__main__25"/>tunate guest whose illness encreased to <lb n="c57-0177__main__26"/> such a degree that <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e35994"/>to<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e35994"/> he was entirely <lb n="c57-0177__main__27"/> confined to his bed. The ice cracked be<lb n="c57-0177__main__28"/>hind us and was driven with force <lb n="c57-0177__main__29"/> towards the north – a bree<mdel>h</mdel>ze sprung <lb n="c57-0177__main__30"/> from that quarter –<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>andon the 11<shi rend="sup">th</shi> the passage to <lb n="c57-0177__main__31"/> wards the south <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e36042"/>was<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e36042"/>became free <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0177__main__d3e36049"/>on th<del eID="c57-0177__main__d3e36049"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__32"/> When the sailors saw this & that their <lb n="c57-0177__main__33"/> return towards their native country <lb n="c57-0177__main__34"/> was apparently assured a shout of <lb n="c57-0177__main__35"/> tumutuous joy broke from them<lb n="c57-0178__main__1"/> loud & long continued.– Frankenstein who was dozing <lb n="c57-0178__main__2"/> awoke<mdel>k</mdel>de & asked the reason of the tumult– I was unable to <lb n="c57-0178__main__3"/> reply. He asked again – They shout I said be<lb n="c57-0178__main__4"/>cause they will soon return to England.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__5"/> Do you then really return.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__6"/> Alas yes. I cannot with<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0178__main__d3e36103"/>a<del eID="c57-0178__main__d3e36103"/>stand their <lb n="c57-0178__main__7"/> demands – I cannot lead them <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0178__main__d3e36108"/>to danger<del eID="c57-0178__main__d3e36108"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__8"/> unwi<mdel>tt</mdel>llingly to dangerer& I must return.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__9"/> Do so if you will, <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0178__main__d3e36130"/>said my friend,<del eID="c57-0178__main__d3e36130"/> but <lb n="c57-0178__main__10"/> I will not. You may give up your pur<lb n="c57-0178__main__11"/>pose but mine is assigned to b<mdel>e</mdel>y heaven <lb n="c57-0178__main__12"/> and I dare not. I am weak, continued he <lb n="c57-0178__main__13"/> sinking down<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0178__main__d3e36158"/>g<del eID="c57-0178__main__d3e36158"/> again but surely the minis<lb n="c57-0178__main__14"/>ters<lb n="c57-0178__left_margin__1"/>spirits who assist my vengeance will endow <lb n="c57-0178__main__15"/> me with sufficient strength – Saying <lb n="c57-0178__main__16"/> this endeavoured to spring from the bed <lb n="c57-0178__main__17"/> but the exertion was too great <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0178__main__d3e36195"/>fror<del eID="c57-0178__main__d3e36195"/>for him <lb n="c57-0178__main__18"/> he fell back & fainted.
